references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a foundational visual-linguistic model leveraged by many HOI detection approaches, including the method described in this paper.

references.paper_title: Gen-VLKT: Simplify association and enhance interaction understanding for HOI detection
references.reason: This paper is a highly cited work in HOI detection, serving as a strong baseline for comparison and a key inspiration for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, a core technology used by the proposed method for image generation and feature extraction, significantly impacting its performance.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper introduces textual inversion, a key technique adopted and extended in this paper for relation-centric modeling of HOI.

references.paper_title: Open-vocabulary panoptic segmentation with text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the power of diffusion models for complex vision tasks, providing further motivation and a technical foundation for using them in HOI detection.
